com.dpsframework

Class PsBoardAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • com.dpsframework.PsBoardAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.dpsframework.core.behaviour.BhConstants, PsConstants, jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class PsBoardAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
implements PsConstants, com.dpsframework.core.behaviour.BhConstants
    An agent connected to own database catalog file on ./var directory with all behavior made on external script files.

    Since:
    2015, update at: 2018-07-15
    Version:
    1.7 (Build.1814)
    Author:
    Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
